actions.text: Reported to House (Amended) by House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.  Report No: 97-53.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations to carry out the Marine Mammal Protection Act of 1972 during fiscal year 1982.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries with amendment, H. Rept. 97-53) Amends the Marine Mammal Protection Act of 1972 to authorize appropriations for the Departments of Commerce and the Interior for: (1) marine mammal research grants for fiscal year 1982; and (2) marine mammal protection for fiscal years 1981 and 1982.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations to carry out the Marine Mammal Protection Act of 1972 during fiscal year 1982.
